author: newsr.in
title: Cricket-Test Series Sri Lanka v West Indies scoreboard
text: Oct 24 (Infostrada Sports) - Scoreboard at lunch on the third day in the second and final Test between Sri Lanka and West Indies on Saturday in Colombo, Sri Lanka Sri Lanka 1st innings 200 (M. Siriwardana 68; J. Warrican 4-67) West Indies 1st innings 163 (D. Prasad 4-34) Sri Lanka 2nd innings (Overnight: 76-2) D. Karunaratne c Bishoo b Taylor 0 K. Silva c Blackwood b Warrican 32 K. Mendis c Ramdin b Warrica Â»
